hi

%

<>hi</>

%

    hi

%

<>hi</>

%

hello     world

%

<>hello world</>

%

{somevar}

%

$0.somevar

%

{somevar}{anothervar}

%

<>{$0.somevar}{$0.anothervar}</>

%

<span></span>

%

<span></span>

%

<span>hi</span><b>hello</b>

%

<><span>hi</span><b>hello</b></>

%

<img>

%

<img />

%

<span>

%

<span></span>

%

{?x}{/x}

%

($0.x && <></>)

%

{?hi}sup{/hi}

%

($0.hi && <>sup</>)

%

{?hi}<span></span>{/hi}

%

($0.hi && <span></span>)

%

{?hi}<img><hr>{/hi}

%

($0.hi && <><img /><hr /></>)

%

{^x}{/x}

%

(!$0.x && <></>)

%

{#x}{/x}

%

$0.x.map($1 => <></>)

%

{#hi}hi{/hi}

%

$0.hi.map($1 => <React.Fragment key={ $1.key }>hi</React.Fragment>)

%

{!Hi hello}

%

<>{ /* Hi hello */ }</>
